conbody.p: (b)(1)(iii) Using the format in Annex 3, submit domestic nonavailability determinations (DNADs) for approval by SECNAV via DASN(P) by email at usn.pentagon.asstsecnavrdadc.mbx.pabt@us.navy.mil with the subject
(2) When submitting DNADs for approval, include analysis of market research and analysis of alternatives memorandum as supporting documentation using the format in Annex 3.
